Pop Culture.name: Friends & Fortune
Pop Culture.description: Test your knowledge of classic sitcoms and iconic brands! This quiz dives into the details of 'Friends' and the world of advertising, covering everything from culinary characters to candy mascots.

questions.text: Which character on the TV show 'Friends' is a chef?
What are the names of the two primary M&M's spokes-candies?
Which of these television programs did not feature characters introduced on 'Happy Days'?

Pop Culture.name: Designing Women & Disc Days
Pop Culture.description: Step back into the 80s and 90s with this quiz! We're exploring the world of 'Designing Women' and the rise of the compact disc, covering everything from career paths to pop culture trends.

questions.text: What is Delta Burke's character's job on the sitcom 'Designing Women'?
What are the plastic boxes that hold compact discs called?
Which of these performers made her film debut in Spike Lee's 'Do the Right Thing'?
What famous radio personality was also the voice of Shaggy on the cartoon 'Scooby-Doo'?
In the comic strip 'Peanuts' what is Schroeder known for doing?

Pop Culture.name: CHiPs & Cheers: The 80s Flashback

questions.text: On the TV show 'CHiPs' what was Officer Frank Poncherello's nickname?

Pop Culture.name: Tuna, Oreos & 007
Pop Culture.description: Dive into the world of advertising and movie magic! This quiz covers everything from the StarKist tuna mascot to Woody Allen's role in a James Bond film, testing your knowledge of iconic brands and cinematic moments.

questions.text: What is the name of the StarKist tuna mascot?

Pop Culture.name: A League of Their Own & Mr. Peabody's Time Machine
Pop Culture.description: Step onto the baseball diamond and into a time-traveling adventure! This quiz covers everything from the 1992 film 'A League of Their Own' to the classic cartoon 'Mr. Peabody's Time Machine', testing your knowledge of sports and animation.

questions.text: What singer appeared in the 1992 baseball film 'A League of Their Own'?
What fictional character claims to be 'smarter than the average bear'?
